Hi Mike,

First off, thanks for all the great uploads.  We all appreciate your time and the effort you put into making fantastic torrents.  So, again, thank you! :)

Secondly, I have a request.  I'm looking for the full DVD of Quiz Show.  If you have this, I'd greatly appreciate you uploading.  Thanks very much, and good luck!
